event.description: Come hear Steve Haley speak about Ancient Man - Lecture Style. If you'd like to pre-read Genesis chapters 1-11 that would be helpful. Emphasizing Chapter 4 & the Tower of Babel in Chapter 11. The age of the audience he will be speaking to is around 8yrs - HS, but everyone is welcome. We would like people to register so we know how many to plan for. Location is at PHCC & Registration will come out the second week of November. There will be a donation envelope for Steve, if the Lord puts it on your heart to contribute.
